name: zapt
description: Simples app para controlar as necessidades do Zapt Arteatral

scripts.bundle-www: npm run clean-www && npm run browserify && cp -r resources/src/{css,img,index.html} www
scripts.emulate-ios: npm run bundle-www && cordova emulate ios
scripts.emulate-browser: npm run bundle-www && cordova emulate browser

author: Luiz Gonzaga dos Santos Filho
